## Notes:
- Look into SpecAugment for finetuning: https://arxiv.org/abs/1904.08779 (on by default

citation.excerpt: Look into SpecAugment for finetuning: https://arxiv.org/abs/1904.08779 (on by default)

installation.excerpt:
: make virtual env 
pip install -r requirements.txt

invocation.excerpt:
unzip the file  
python preproc.py 
python train.py 
python evaluate.py
